ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake Hunt Part 4: Cobra places the captured Snake Eyes behind heavy defences as they prepare the Brainwave Scanner for him. Zartan liberates Destro and the Baroness from Revanche. The Oktober Guard have begun working undercover in Springfield and at least one of them is a Revanche android. Joe Colton and Jane try to monitor events in Springfield but Cobra destroys their spy satellite. Storm Shadow and the other ninjas vow to rescue Snake Eyes. Snake Eyes' father Wade comes to Fort Wadsworth to offer his help.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 13:43:24. [CVDB732565] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:22. [Issue ID 2054302]
